go_data.justification: Bcl-2 proteins have been shown to inhibit apoptosis.
Poxvirus Bcl-2-like proteins, including those similar to Bcl-2, are involved in regulation of host immune response.
Bcl-2-like proteins, such as F1 and N1, have a surface groove for binding BH3 peptides from pro-apoptotic Bcl-2 proteins.
